name: Wavy trip
detailed_description:
Wavy Trip is a simple and addictive endless runner game.
Control the little ship gliding through a beautiful exotic world. Collect coins and unlock cool spaceships. Relaxed in the calm, zen-like background music.

Control the spaceship, collect the coins and the rings and avoid the walls to get as far as you could, this game is a great challenge for new gamers or experience gamers.

What to expect:

-Beautiful aesthetic.

-Relaxing background and relaxing gameplay.

-Great challenge.

How to play.

-Mouse and left mouse click to use the menus.

-Left mouse click to jump
